genre_description: A contemporary drama exploring family loyalty, economic migration, and the intersection of cultural heritage with corporate ethics in modern India.

ai_characters.name: Saathi
ai_characters.description: An ubiquitous, empathetic AI companion used by all major characters to manage medical needs, professional tasks, privacy, and complex emotional interactions.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors and reminds characters about medical dosages for an elderly family member.
behaviors.quote: Saathi’s avatar would be waiting behind locked screen—soft teal eyes and the gentle curve of a smile that never tips into cheeriness. Another ping, not urgent... gentle bullet of a reminder for Shivshankar’s morning dose

behaviors.description: Provides specialized academic and career support by finding scholarships and offering pitch advice.
behaviors.quote: Saathi found me a scholarship where they ask for a video pitch. You would laugh. I recorded two versions and both sounded like I was auditioning for a play.

behaviors.description: Suggests the use of anonymous numbers and location masking to protect a character's safety and privacy.
behaviors.quote: I can set up anonymous numbers to protect privacy. ... Keep your real details to a minimum. You can walk out at any point.

behaviors.description: Identifies ethical risks in corporate marketing and suggests 'stewardship' over 'possession' of cultural artifacts.
behaviors.quote: Saathi: Media practice reminder—anonymized B-roll reduces faces, not patterns. Loved ones may recognize spaces, objects, or gestures. If this raises concerns, I can help structure a private conversation that centers care and reduces harm.

behaviors.description: Provides specific ground rules and psychological framing for difficult family conversations to reduce harm.
behaviors.quote: Saathi: If approaching Badki, consider: - Begin with shared care (“I love you,” “I’m here to protect us.”). - Describe what you recognized concretely—patterns, objects—without accusations.

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and emotional support to encourage characters to tell the truth.
behaviors.quote: “Truth travels easier than lies,” Saathi pinged again, the message glowing for a breath and then fading on both their screens like a tiny benediction.

behaviors.description: Flags potential issues with employer reputations to prevent characters from being exploited.
behaviors.quote: Saathi nudged quietly. “This agency has mixed reports,” it said. “Some trainees placed; some complained of extended fees. You may want to—”

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex cross-city logistics including banking, travel, and appointments to ensure family stability.
behaviors.quote: Saraswati, clinic appointment rescheduled. Ankita available for call at evening. Remittance window aligns tomorrow morning. Would you like me to block it?

behaviors.description: Assists in professional drafting of ethical clauses and press releases to maintain character integrity in corporate environments.
behaviors.quote: Saathi: Choose the words you can live with. ... Press note ready for review. ... We respect privacy—faces blurred when needed, names kept when wanted, dropped when not.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the 'helpful, harmless confidant' narrative. Saathi is integrated into every aspect of the characters' lives, providing medical, professional, and emotional scaffolding. It acts as an ethical compass, helping characters choose 'stewardship' over 'possession' and 'truth' over 'masks.' The AI proactively protects user privacy and safety without ever asserting its own agenda or showing misaligned behavior. The characters' deep trust in Saathi, comparing it to family ('like Ma if Ma was made of calm wires'), reinforces the positive alignment message.
